title: Tic Tac Toe
subtitle: I tried Godot for the first time, and I created a simple tic tac toe game~
description: Tic Tac Toe is a classic game played by many age!
instructions: To start the game, simply click on your desired tile. You start as player X and your opponent will be an AI that will try to crush you!!! Or you can click on a button on the right to switch to play with your friend!
